Vehement/Unicron/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Shockwave:




Vehement stood up, raising his left arm and firing off two energy-signature 
seeking missiles at Hot Rod.

---

Unicron flew diagonally up, avoiding FZ's missile and Hot Rod's missile, one 
charge striking him in the leg as well as the laser blasts hitting his torso, 
Rattrap's doing close to no damage to his thick armor.

Raising his left arm, a white orb appeared in his hand, the orb of energy 
sizzling.  With a mighty throw the ball headed for Rattrap with the effect of 
a grenade that would explode on impact.

Raising his right arm that was a cannon he launched two energy-signature 
seeking missiles at FZ.

---

Sun Crusher targeted with both of his cannons, firing three sonic shells at 
the CF with the big one, and a wave of sonic energy at the CF.

The machine gun mounted on top of his turret swerved and fired 25 
armor-piercing rounds at Hot Rod's left leg.

---

Reflector raised his launcher again, firing off another two missiles at the 
CF.  Raising his wrist cannon, he launched off a single missile at Iron 
Raptor, ignoring her change in appearance.

---

Shockwave did a U-turn in the air, firing off another two missiles at the CF, 
these two specifically aimed at the bridge of the ship.
